author: hlship
msg: Simplify EnhancementOperation interface and implementation, since Tapestry components are always abstract and will always have enhancements.

author: hlship
msg: Properly set the "virtual" application specification location, for applications that don't have one, so that the application can still have a localized message catalog.

author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-242: Allow namespaces to provide default messages for pages and components.

author: hlship
msg: Refactor localized messages; inject messages property into component classes.
